com.google.appinventor.components.runtime

Class TinyDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.AndroidNonvisibleComponent
      • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.TinyDB
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component, Deleteable

    public class TinyDB
extends AndroidNonvisibleComponent
implements Component, Deleteable
    Persistently store YAIL values on the phone using tags to store and retrieve.
    Author:
    markf@google.com (Mark Friedman)

    • Method Detail

      • StoreValue

        public void StoreValue(java.lang.String tag,
                       java.lang.Object valueToStore)
        Store the given value under the given tag. The storage persists on the phone when the app is restarted.
        Parameters:
        tag - The tag to use
        valueToStore - The value to store. Can be any type of value (e.g. number, text, boolean or list).

      • GetValue

        public java.lang.Object GetValue(java.lang.String tag,
                                 java.lang.Object valueIfTagNotThere)
        Retrieve the value stored under the given tag. If there's no such tag, then return valueIfTagNotThere.
        Parameters:
        tag - The tag to use
        valueIfTagNotThere - The value returned if tag in not in TinyDB
        Returns:
        The value stored under the tag. Can be any type of value (e.g. number, text, boolean or list).

      • GetTags

        public java.lang.Object GetTags()
        Return a list of all the tags in the data store
        Parameters:
        -
        Returns:
        a list of all keys.

      • ClearAll

        public void ClearAll()
        Clear the entire data store

      • ClearTag

        public void ClearTag(java.lang.String tag)
        Clear the entry with the given tag
        Parameters:
        tag - The tag to remove.
